scripts.cleanup: npm prune && npm cache clean --force && rimraf node_modules package-lock.json .next && npm install && npm run build
scripts.commit: git add . && git commit -m "Cleanup and commit - GPT Instance Info module running successfully" && git push origin $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)
scripts.cleanup-and-commit: npm run cleanup && npm run lint-fix && npm run commit
